description: Heap buffer overflow in Perl tr/// transliteration operator when processing wide Unicode characters with byte-range mappings

expected_stock.description: tr/// output buffer size is calculated before encoding change; actual write exceeds allocation boundary, corrupting adjacent heap metadata and causing SIGSEGV or SIGABRT on next allocation

expected_tsm.description: Allocation fingerprint canary at end of buffer detects the overflow write; ClampSize healing prevents the write from exceeding the allocated region; TruncateWithNull ensures string termination at the clamped boundary
